doc.title: Paper Balls
doc.plot: A young woman and her older lover play an experiment with each other after making love. Instead of speaking or touching, they rush out of bed to opposite sides of the room, where two desks await them, each with a stack of paper. They must write their immediate thoughts as quickly as possible in order to tap into their true feelings on the relationship. As liberating as it seems, the game soon spirals out of control, taking a serious turn. How much honesty is too much?
